t: Amazon makes its own TVs now, and one responds to 'Alexa' hands-free - CNET
s: September 10, 2021 - In a nod toward the ubiquity of video chat, the Fire TV Omni will be the first smart TV with built-in Zoom (the second-generation Fire TV Cube also supports Zoom). To use it you'll need to connect an optional USB webcam to the TV. Zoom launches on the Omni TV "later this year," according to Amazon.
